assessment.question:
What is the result of the following?
my_list = [3, 1, 4, 1, 5]
my_list.sort()
print(my_list)
What will be the result of my_list.extend([7, 8]) if my_list = [1, 2, 3]?
The sort() method changes the __________ list.
A list cannot store duplicate values.
The insert() method allows adding elements at a __________ index.
